name: detox
description: Detox - A cross-platform library for Haxe to make working with Xml and the DOM easy... similar to jQuery and friends, but works wherever Haxe works, in a more haxe-like way.
releasenote: Change `hide()` and `show()` to fallback to `addClass('hidden')` and `removeClass('hidden')` respectively on non-JS platforms. Change `dtx-show` and `dtx-hide` attributes to use `Style.show`. Fix for widget null checking so it no longer checks null against false, true or null expressions (whoops).
